scripts.localstack:start: cd IAC/dev && sudo docker compose up -d && cd ../..
scripts.localstack:stop: cd IAC/dev && sudo docker compose down && cd ../..
scripts.iac:dev: aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 cloudformation create-stack --stack-name colaaqui-dev-stack --template-body file://IAC/dev/dev-template.yaml --profile localstack
